title: Julianne Hough and Fiancé Brooks Laich Make Red Carpet Debut After Engagement
content:
Brooks Laich and Julianne Hough 
 
Jason LaVeris/FilmMagic 
  
By @mcorriston  
 09/01/2015 AT 09:35 AM EDT  
 Julianne Hough isn't camera-shy anymore. 
After hiding her breathtaking engagement ring (if most stars receive rocks, this bling is a boulder ) for days, the Dancing with the Stars judge is flaunting her engagement bliss, hitting her first red carpet with fiancé Brooks Laich on Sunday since accepting his proposal.  

Hough, 27, and Laich, 32, attended the Television Academy Cocktail Reception for Outstanding Choreography at the Montage Hotel in Beverly Hills, California, together, glowing as they embraced each other throughout the event.  

The hockey player popped the question two weeks ago. He and Hough began their relationship in February 2014.  
  
At the reception Sunday, Hough's brother Derek said he "couldn't be happier for the two of them." 
"I knew that it was happening within the first month they were dating," the DWTS pro told PEOPLE of the couple's plan to walk down the aisle. "It was one of those things where it was instant and that smile and glow she's had hasn't dimmed ever since she met [him]. That's a special thing."  

 With reporting by MATTHEW COLE WEISS
